title: (Almost) Free FontLab Class
content:
Hi Folks,

I am happy to report that I have a FontLab class starting up soon. Most of you probably don't need it (it's super basic), but anyone who's interested is welcome.

All that entry requires in enrolling at [City College](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162027/http:/www.ccsf.edu/Offices/Matriculation/step1.htm) and having some demonstrable command of Bézier curves (like in Illustrator).

Everything else we can take care of on the first day of class.

GRPH 152 Digital Font Creation  
Wednesdays: 6:00–10:00pm, Visual Arts 143  
CCSF Ocean Campus: 50 Phelan Ave.  
8-week course: October 26–December 14, 2005  
CRN 76938

BTW, it's a one-unit class, making it a whopping $26!

Feel free to email me with questions,

Amy Conger  
 [http://fog.ccsf.cc.ca.us/~aconger/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162027/http:/fog.ccsf.cc.ca.us/~aconger/)  
 [http://www.abecedarienne.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162027/http:/www.abecedarienne.com/ "http://www.abecedarienne.com")
author: abecedarienne
